titleStmt.title: The exercise of a Christian life written by G.L. ; being the first ground and foundaion [sic], whence the two treatises appertaining to resolution, were made and framed, by R.P.
Esercizio della vita cristiana. English
titleStmt.author: Loarte, Gaspare, d. 1578.
Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.
Banister, Mr.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Leake, and are to be sold in Pauls church yard at the signe of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: R.P. is Robert Parsons; trans. by a Mr. Banister, son of J. Banister. Cf. STC (2nd ed.); dedicated to Iohn Banester.
Colophon reads: Imprinted at London by Peter Short, for William Leake.
Reproduction of originals in: Harvard University Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pauls church yard at the signe of the Crane
